pageDescription1: The fear of running out of battery in an electric car is one of the main obstacles that the users have to deal with. It is a real need of users to know if there is any charge point along the way that is going to be taken.
pageDescription2: Through Move, we enable users to access a direct search of charge points thanks to the geolocation in real time. The power of Move hit from 20 to 200 km of radius, so any user can have an accurate route. A través de la búsqueda directa de Move podrás encontrar la geolocalización en tiempo real de los puntos de carga a lo largo de la zona a la cuál te quieras dirigir, con un radio de 20 a 300 km siempre que se encuentre dentro de la Península.
pageDescription3: Move provides the ideal path to take whitelist informs the user about charge points, occupation rate and price.
